SEARCH

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApp
public class Main extends Object implements IApp
The Main class contains the entry point of the application. It creates an instance of the MainForm class to start the application. It also starts a ChatServer and sets up a graceful shutdown process.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method serves as the entry point of the application. It starts the ChatServer in a separate daemon thread, initializes the MainForm, and registers a shutdown hook for graceful application termination.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).

    • start

      public void start()
      Description copied from interface: IApp
      Starts the application. This method should contain all necessary initialization and setup required to run the application.
      Specified by:
      start in interface IApp

      public void shutDown()
      Description copied from interface: IApp
      Shuts down the application. This method should handle any necessary cleanup operations, such as releasing resources or saving data before exit.
